November 10, 2008

Keep It Simple

I'm always on the lookout for a high-quality html/css template. I found StyleShout.com after reading Walkah's post about building a Drupal theme out of the VectorLover template. That's where I found KeepItSimple, a simple, clean and full-featured template.

I’ve taken Walkah’s cue and turned this template into a Drupal 6 theme. I liked the results so much, I’ve decided to use it here on my own blog. I’ll be cleaning it up and releasing it here. Sorry Drupal.org, this template is not GPL so it won’t make it into contrib. Maybe I can talk the author into a dual-license.

Update: I’m no longer using this theme on my site.

Further reading: If you liked this post, you might want to check out some of my other posts about drupal, or other posts from November 2008.
